=== Introduction ===

Zeitgeist Explorer is a tool which can be used to debug Zeitgeist. It has two major functionality

* Monitor Events
* Explore Events

In case of Monitor events, the tool works like Wireshark - listening to event insertions in real time and showing it to the user

In case of explore events, the database is queries and the events are shown.

=== Development ===

Zeitgeist Explorer is developed on Launchpad

https://launchpad.net/zeitgeist-explorer
